summary: RST Tables : Allows to create and edit restructuredText tables easily [unicode]
name: RST-Tables-works-with-non-english-langu
description:
Edited plugin with cyrillic support (and other non-english, i think).
Original plugin: http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=3041
install_details:
1. You should install vim_bridge with pypi/easy_install/etc. For ArchLinux: easy_install-2.7 vim_bridge.
2. Place plugin in .vim/plugin folder.
3. Your vim must have python interpreter support.
